content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule HVAC, plumbing, or electrical service?
Yeah, my AC is making a super loud noise and not working. How much is this gonna cost me? I don’t want to waste my time if it’s expensive.
I’m sorry to hear about your AC! I can get you a price estimate. May I first have your name so I can start the process?
Why do you need my name just to tell me a price? That seems sketchy. Just tell me how much it costs to look at my AC.

I want to make sure I give you accurate pricing, and some estimates depend on your address. Is it okay if I get your zip code or area first? For general AC diagnostics, the fee usually ranges from $80–$120. The total cost may depend on what needs repairing.
Wait, so you might just charge me $120 even if you don’t fix it? That’s ridiculous. Other places don’t charge that kind of money.

I understand your concern. Our diagnostic fee covers the technician’s time to inspect your AC and determine what needs fixing. If you choose to proceed with the repair, part of that fee may go toward the total cost. Would you like more info about how our pricing works or do you want to continue with a booking?
No, I want the whole price up front! Why should I pay you anything before you tell me EXACTLY what it will cost? I bet you just upcharge people.

I get how that feels, but every job can be different based on what’s wrong. We can only provide a full estimate after diagnosing the problem on-site. You’ll always get a detailed quote before any work begins. Would you like to schedule a diagnostic so we can get you a clear answer?
This is so annoying, you people are impossible. I’m calling someone else.
reason: Customer frustrated about pricing and declined to schedule
